type: Legendary Creature – Human Mercenary Lord Demigod
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Great Aether[/i] – Whenever Ike, Radiant Hero attacks, all creatures able to block him do so. Then, for each creature blocking Ike, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Dawn's Hero[/i] – Whenever another creature you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on Ike.
